unnormalised: Mumbai, October 26 – Accurate inventory forecasting is becoming increasingly crucial for Indian manufacturers facing fluctuating demand and global supply chain disruptions. Dr. Anjali Sharma, Professor of Operations Management at IIM Bangalore, emphasizes that effective forecasting can significantly reduce holding costs and prevent stockouts, boosting profitability.

Doctor Anjali Sharma, Professor of Operations Management at I I M Bangalore, emphasizes that effective forecasting can significantly reduce holding costs and prevent stockouts, boosting profitability.

unnormalised: "Implementing robust inventory forecasting models, incorporating factors like seasonality (Diwali rush, anyone?), lead times, and promotional events, is no longer a luxury but a necessity," she stated.
